00024 // First, check if Armadillo was included before, warning if so.
00025 #ifdef ARMA_INCLUDES
00026 #pragma message "Armadillo was included before mlpack; this can sometimes cause\
00027 problems.  It should only be necessary to include <mlpack/core.hpp> and not\
00028 <armadillo>."
00029 #endif
00030 
00031 // Next, standard includes.

00041 // Defining _USE_MATH_DEFINES should set M_PI.
00042 #define _USE_MATH_DEFINES
00043 #include <math.h>
00044 
00045 // For tgamma().
00046 #include <boost/math/special_functions/gamma.hpp>
00047 
00048 // But if it's not defined, we'll do it.
00049 #ifndef M_PI
00050   #define M_PI 3.141592653589793238462643383279
00051 #endif
00052 
00053 // Give ourselves a nice way to force functions to be inline if we need.
00054 #define force_inline
00055 #if defined(__GNUG__) && !defined(DEBUG)
00056   #undef force_inline
00057   #define force_inline __attribute__((always_inline))
00058 #elif defined(_MSC_VER) && !defined(DEBUG)
00059   #undef force_inline
00060   #define force_inline __forceinline
00061 #endif
00062 
00063 // Now include Armadillo through the special mlpack extensions.
00064 #include <mlpack/core/arma_extend/arma_extend.hpp>
00065 
00066 #endif
